name: Heroes Chronicles: Conquest of the Underworld and Warlords of the Wasteland
name_original: Heroes Chronicles: Conquest of the Underworld and Warlords of the Wasteland
description:
Heroes Chronicles: Conquest of the Underworld and Warlords of the Wasteland is a strategy game developed by New World Computing. It came out on 01-09-2000. The 3DO Company published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Heroes Chronicles: Conquest of the Underworld and Warlords of the Wasteland is available on PC.
